languages.text: Каждое путешествие через варп сопряжено со смертельным риском. Покинув реальный мир, пустотное судно отдается на волю варпа, от которого судно и команду защищает лишь тонкая пелена поля Геллера.

traits.locale_text: Каждое путешествие через варп сопряжено со смертельным риском. Покинув реальный мир, пустотное судно отдается на волю варпа, от которого судно и команду защищает лишь тонкая пелена поля Геллера.

languages.text: Every journey through the Immaterium is fraught with deadly risk. When a voidship leaves realspace, it is at the mercy of the warp, with the flimsy veil of the Geller field the only thing standing between the crew and oblivion.
languages.original_text: Каждое путешествие через варп сопряжено со смертельным риском. Покинув реальный мир, пустотное судно отдается на волю варпа, от которого судно и команду защищает лишь тонкая пелена поля Геллера.

traits.locale_text: Every journey through the Immaterium is fraught with deadly risk. When a voidship leaves realspace, it is at the mercy of the warp, with the flimsy veil of the Geller Field the only thing standing between the crew and oblivion.

Every journey through the Immaterium is fraught with deadly risk. When a voidship leaves realspace, it is at the mercy of the warp, with the flimsy veil of the Geller Field the only thing standing between the crew and oblivion.

Every journey through the Immaterium is fraught with deadly risk. When a voidship leaves realspace, it is at the mercy of the warp, with the flimsy veil of the Geller field the only thing standing between the crew and oblivion.

languages.text: Chaque traversée de l'Immaterium est semée de périls mortels. L'équipage d'un vaisseau quittant l'espace réel est à la merci du Warp et ne peut compter que sur la mince protection du champ de Geller du navire pour assurer sa survie.
languages.original_text: Every journey through the Immaterium is fraught with deadly risk. When a voidship leaves realspace, it is at the mercy of the warp, with the flimsy veil of the Geller field the only thing standing between the crew and oblivion.

traits.locale_text: Chaque traversée de l'Immaterium est semée de périls mortels. L'équipage d'un vaisseau spatial quittant l'espace réel est à la merci du Warp et ne peut compter que sur la mince protection du champ de Geller du navire pour assurer sa survie.

languages.text: Cada viaje por el Inmaterio está plagado de peligros letales. Cuando una nave del vacío abandona el espacio real, queda a merced de la disformidad, y el delgado velo del campo Geller es la única barrera entre la tripulación y el olvido.
languages.original_text: Every journey through the Immaterium is fraught with deadly risk. When a voidship leaves realspace, it is at the mercy of the warp, with the flimsy veil of the Geller field the only thing standing between the crew and oblivion.

traits.locale_text: Cada viaje por el Inmaterio está plagado de peligros letales. Cuando una nave del vacío abandona el espacio real, queda a merced de la disformidad, y el delgado velo del campo Geller es la única barrera entre la tripulación y el olvido.

languages.text: 非物質世界を通過する旅には、命がけの危険がつきまとう。ヴォイドシップがリアルスペースを離れると、歪みのただなかに放り出される。クルーと忘却の狭間をわかつのは、ゲラーフィールドという薄っぺらなヴェールだけだ。
languages.original_text: Every journey through the Immaterium is fraught with deadly risk. When a voidship leaves realspace, it is at the mercy of the warp, with the flimsy veil of the Geller field the only thing standing between the crew and oblivion.

traits.locale_text: 非物質世界を通過する旅には、命がけの危険がつきまとう。ヴォイドシップがリアルスペースを離れると、歪みのただなかに放り出される。クルーと忘却の狭間をわかつのは、ゲラーフィールドという薄っぺらなヴェールだけだ。

languages.text: 每次穿越亚空间的旅程，都充满了致命的风险。一旦虚空舰离开真实世界之后，便会任由亚空间的摆布。而盖勒力场这层脆弱的面纱，便是船员与湮灭之间的唯一屏障。
languages.original_text: Every journey through the Immaterium is fraught with deadly risk. When a voidship leaves realspace, it is at the mercy of the warp, with the flimsy veil of the Geller field the only thing standing between the crew and oblivion.

traits.locale_text: 每次穿越亚空间的旅程，都充满了致命的风险。一旦虚空舰离开真实世界之后，便会任由亚空间的摆布。而盖勒力场这层脆弱的面纱，便是船员与湮灭之间的唯一屏障。

languages.text: Jede Reise durch das Immaterium birgt ein tödliches Risiko. Sobald ein Raumschiff den Realraum verlässt, ist es der Gnade des Warps ausgeliefert und allein der hauchdünne Schleier des Gellerfeldes steht zwischen Crew und Vergessenheit.
languages.original_text: Every journey through the Immaterium is fraught with deadly risk. When a voidship leaves realspace, it is at the mercy of the warp, with the flimsy veil of the Geller field the only thing standing between the crew and oblivion.

traits.locale_text: Jede Reise durch das Immaterium birgt ein tödliches Risiko. Sobald ein Raumschiff den Realraum verlässt, ist es der Gnade des Warps ausgeliefert und allein der hauchdünne Schleier des Gellerfeldes steht zwischen Crew und Vergessenheit.

languages.text: Tindiyar'da yapılan her yolculuk, ölümcül risklerle doludur. Bir uçsuz gemisi, gerçekuzaydan ayrıldığında öteboyutun insafına kalır. Tindiyar'dayken Geller alanının incecik örtüsü, mürettebat ile yok oluş arasında duran tek perdedir.
languages.original_text: Every journey through the Immaterium is fraught with deadly risk. When a voidship leaves realspace, it is at the mercy of the warp, with the flimsy veil of the Geller field the only thing standing between the crew and oblivion.
